title: jIvap-paDagai OTTum
sahitya:
jIvap-paDagai OTTum dEvadEvanai nambi cittam kalangAdiruppOm manamE


anupallavi

  nAvAyiram ezhundu kUvip-puraNDalaindu tAvum vinaik-kaDalil mEvum karuNai koNDE


caraNam    duhkka kaDum puyalgaL ekkip-porudiDinum dikku dishai arindu sukkAnait-tiruppiyE
pakkuvamAgat-taLLip-parindaruL turai sErkkum paramporuL irukkaiyil bhayamillai tuyarillai
